titleStmt.title: The articles of Exeter, made on the rendition thereof. With the vote of the Honourable House of Commons, in the approbation of them of the 6. of May, 1646. VVith the order and ordinance of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled, for the approbation, publication, and observation of them, by all committees, judges, and officers, and others concerned in them, of the 4. of this instant Novemb. 1647.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
